column1: starts with a length ball around off, defended on the off side from the crease
length but on the hips this time, tucks it towards square leg
a touch fuller and around middle this time, bringing the batsman forward, defended back
back of length outside off, drops it on the off side and steals a quick single, off the mark
length around off, just nipping back in to beat the forward defence, raps him on the front foot, a mild appeal for lbw but the umpire says not out. Was impact outside the off stump?
length again, Finch is half-forward, gets an outside edge past the slip, a single to third man and he too is off the mark
length around off and middle, a bit of jag back to hit Finch high on the thigh
length around middle and off, Finch is unsure of his footwork, pushes it towards short midwicket
Khaleel has overstepped, length around off, much better from Finch, gets behind the line and defends, a big no-ball there
and he misses out, short of length outside off, clears his front leg and looks to hoick it on the leg side, fails to connect
length ball on the pads, tucks it away towards square leg for a couple
length outside off, fifth stump line, Finch leaves it alone
back of length outside off, Finch rises on his toes and punches it through cover, comes back for the third
length outside off, comes forward and looks to defend, the ball takes the outer half and goes towards gully

bowled 'im, through the gate. This one nips back in off the length, Finch again wasn't sure about his footwork, gets half-forward, leaves the gap between the bat and the pad through which the ball sneaks in to hit the off stump. That's also the 100th ODI wicket for Bhuvi
length around off and middle, gets behind the line and offers a solid defence
short of length outside off, gets on his toes and punches it towards mid-off, doesn't get the best of the timings
a touch fuller around off this time, driven but straight towards extra cover
back of length around off and middle, some extra bounce there but Khawaja takes his bottom hand off and dabs it behind square
another no-ball by Khaleel, was a length ball around off, defended on the front foot, right under his eyes, that's a huge no-ball
length outside off, Carey goes deep in his crease, clears his front leg and swats it over mid-on for four
length, in the channel this time, left alone
length, in the corridor once again, comes forward before leaving it
length outside off, Carey steers it past the wide second slip, on the right of the fielder, Kuldeep cannot get around it at third man
fuller around off this time, driven firmly towards mid-off, Shami moved to right of the ball but recovers to make a left-handed stop
pitched up again and driven to the right of Shami this time, scampers through for a single, Shami has a shy at the non-striker's end but misses, I think Carey would have been home in any case
length outside off, comes forward and defends with an angled bat
130 kph, length around off, some extra bounce there as Carey comes forward and looks to defend, gets beaten
back of length outside off, dabs it towards cover, was looking for a single but the fielder was quick to the ball
length, angling away from the batsman who stands tall and steers it through cover and point, Jadeja puts in the chase but even he cannot stop it
length ball, in the corridor and left alone this time
length again, in the channel at 127.8kph, shouldered arms once more
length ball around off 135 kph, some extra bounce there, Khawaja was on the front foot, looking to defend, had to take the bottom hand off on the contact
length once more, around that off stump, defended on the front foot
squaring Khawaja up this time, was a length ball on the off stump, just leaving the batsman as he looks to defend, a leading edge but well short of any fielder on the off side

length outside off, taking an outside edge this time because of that spongy bounce, but short of Rohit at wide first slip, a partial stop allows a single, Rohit shies at the stumps and hits direct, and they run an overthrow off the deflection as well
fuller around off, looks to drive on the front foot, a thick outside edge to third man
length outside off, driven straight to extra cover
length, angling across the batsman, steers it towards cover-point, straight to Kohli there
length again, just outside off and driven on the up, Rayudu at cover intercepts this time
short of length on off and middle, moves across and works it towards square leg with wrists
length around middle, a hint of movement into the batsman, defended with a straight bat
short of length, once again that extra bounce there, dealt nicely by Carey, dabs it gently behind square for a couple
short of length outside off, stands in his crease and chops it towards cover-point
back of length outside off, a little bit of room there, cuts it towards third man
length outside off, goes for the cut but not enough room and also the extra bounce means he ended up playing underneath it
back of length outside off, stands tall and defends it towards cover-point
length outside off and cut firmly, straight to extra cover though
fuller on the stump this time, losing his line as well as the length, driven past the left of mid-on fielder
much better, length outside off, comes forward and defends
starts with a length ball around off, defended on the front foot
length ball around middle, looks to flick it on the leg side, gets an inside edge on to the pads
fuller outside off this time, driven but straight to cover-point
138.6kph, length outside off, stays down a bit, beats Khawaja who was playing inside the line, on the second bounce to the keeper
short of length outside off, some room there as well, Khawaja looks to cut hard, gets beaten by the extra bounce this time
a touch fuller on the stumps, flicked towards square leg for a couple
tossed up on the stumps at 80kph, pushed back from the front foot
even slower 78kph, fuller around off, driven back to the bowler
flighted on middle and leg, comes forward and pushes it down the wicket
short of length, goes back and cuts it past the point fielder, piercing the gap between cover and point for four
and he strikes in his first over, length ball, too close to cut but Carey goes for a repeat, gets an outside edge, travelling fast but Rohit takes a good catch at first slip
tossed up around off at 76.8, looks to drive but gets inner half of the bat, rolls towards the bowler
length outside off, dabs it towards point, Marsh was looking for a single, but Khawaja sends him back
length, around middle and off, pushes it back towards the bowler

offcutter, at 130kph, Khawaja was moving across, looks to flick and misses, rapped on the pads and a huge appeal for lbw. India are contemplating to review but decide against it, that looked mighty close
a touch fuller outside off this time and driven through covers, Bhuvneshwar with the chase, puts in the slide but cannot prevent the boundary
length ball and steered towards third man for one
length outside off, almost gets squared off, a thick leading edge towards cover
flighted around off, uses his feet to drive it towards long-off
fuller on the stumps, plenty of air, driven towards midwicket for a couple
flighted outside off, use of feet to drive it towards long-off
fuller this time, around middle, was looking to push through on the off side, ends up pushing it down the wicket
looked like a googly, sliding down, flicks it towards backward square leg
pitched up outside off, driven firmly but sweeper cover cuts it off
back of length outside off, dabs it into the ground, the ball ricochets off the pads towards gully
a jaffa, length ball, in the line of the stumps and just leaving the batsman as he looks to defend, Marsh is lucky to be still there
139.6 kph, this one comes back a bit after landing around off, Marsh was looking to leave and then realises maybe he cannot, looks to defend but by the ball whizzes through bat and pad
a touch fuller on the pads and flicked away this time, gets a boundary to midwicket
short of length outside off, stays back and dabs it towards cover-point
back of length, in the line of the stumps, defended on the off side from the crease
tossed up around off, Khawaja skips down but realises he's been beaten in the flight, defends in the end
length on middle and leg, turns it towards square leg
quicker, at 84kph, length outside off, Khawaja goes for the cut, too close there, misses
tossed up around off at 75kph, drives it with the use of feet, a single to long-off
a low full toss on the stumps this time, hits it down the ground for one more
short of length around off, goes back and pulls it towards long-on
short of length outside off, looked like a cutter, defended from the back foot
length ball outside off, goes for the pull but the ball sneaks underneath, beats the keeper as well, bouncing just in front
length on middle and leg, tucked away towards square leg
short of length, on the body, skids at the batsman who pulls it towards square leg
fuller around off, driven firmly but Kohli at short extra cover comes in the way
short again, swivels to pull it towards deep square leg
goes for the reverse sweep, neat connection but straight to short third man
uses his feet this time, gets to close to the ball, digs it towards sweeper cover
flighted on the stumps, comes down and drives it towards long-on
tossed up on a length outside off, left alone
quicker one, 107 kph, on a length outside off, steers it towards short third man
slightly short this time, rocks back and pulls it towards deep midwicket, gets a boundary
fuller on the pads, flicked towards short fine leg for a quick single
length around off, comes forward and blocks
fuller on the stumps, use of feet to work it in front of square
length around off, comes forward and defends
length outside off, defended on the front foot again
use of feet this time to drive it towards the long-on for one more
78kph, tossed up on off, he reaches out to defend into the off side
77kph, looped up higher, he skips out and drives nicely to straight long on
77kph, tossed up wide of off, he drives flowingly straight to cover though
80kph, straighter, he skips down and is hit on the appeal, they appeal, inquisitive more than genuine interest, he was a long way down
shorter length, he's back and cutting to deep cover-point
looped up, he skips out and chips this just out of reach of Kuldeep diving across, it runs to long on
90kph, very full on leg, he misses out trying to whip through square, it's going well down leg
good length, middle and leg, he tucks this square of the close midwicket for one
angled into middle, he clips it with the turn to deep forward square leg
tossed up on off, he dances out and drives nicely to long on
shorter length, he's back quickly but pulling straight to the man at deep square
tossed up on middle, he strides forward and drives to long on
tossed up on off, he skips out and drives inside out through cover-point to the man in the deep
74kph looped up outside off, he skips out and drives really hard to long off
78kph, top spinner, fourth stump line, he's back and working to midwicket
shorter and wider, he rocks back and cuts very nicely past backward point and it races away! Nicely played by Marsh
76kph, shorter and slower, he sits back and cuts hard to deep point who is infront of square
78kph, looped up on middle and leg, he skips out decisively and drives against the turn to long on
very full, 92kph, on middle, he reverse paddle sweeps to short third man
95kph, shorter outside off, he gives room to cut and misses. Some interest for a stumping, but Khawaja's back foot was always grounded. They are checking with the third umpire. Definitely Not Out.
shorter on middle and off, he turns this wit the spin to midwicket
shorter and quicker, he's back and whipping this firmer through the gap to the man at deep midwicket
shorter length, he's back and working this firmly through the gap to deep midwicket as well
he's down and paddle sweeper from off stump in the air but safely fine for a couple
shorter on leg, he turns this around the corner to short fine
angled into the pads, he glances this to short fine
shorter on leg, he clips this off the pads through forward square
tossed up on middle, he sits back and whips this behind square but to the man in the circle
floated up on middle, he turns this straight to midwicket, can't pick the gap
drifting into leg, he clips this agin straight to the man on the one at midwicket
94kph, wide of the crease, darted into middle and off, he gets an inside edge onto pad, it nearly squeezed through
shorter on leg, he's back and working to a man stationed near the square leg umpire
fuller, 97kph, on middle, he's forward and driving to long on
100kph, good length outside off, he reverse sweeps but straight to short third man
reverse sweeps in the air and just wide of backward point! It wasn't in control but he got it wide of the man and it went safely away to the rope. 100 is up for Australia
95kph, fuller on middle, he skips out and drives to long on
short way down leg, he's back and pulling fine of Dhawan at short fine leg and it runs away for four!
79kph, tossed up on off, he stretches out and defends on the front foot
short ball, dragged down leg, a freebie, he is back and pulling easily up and over short fine leg! Way too easy for Khawaja
looped up very high outside off, he drives firmly out to deep cover
81kph, tossed up on middle, he skips down and drives to long on
tossed up on off, he pushes a drive straight to cover
92kph, darted into leg, he tries to whip, gets an inside edge onto pad and it rolls into the off side
shorter length, on off, he's back and punching down to long on
94kph, tossed up on leg, he clips this to deep midwicket
shorter, 92kph, he's back and tucking it to the man in the circle at square leg
pushed through, 95kph, rushes him, he mistimes a punch to midwicket
fuller, he works this to midwicket and Kohli makes an excellent diving save to stop the one
131kph, good length outside off, he pushes on the front foot to mid off
back of a length on off, 132kph, he's back and working this around the corner. 50 for Khawaja. His 5th in ODI cricket
back of a length, 136, nipping into the left hander, he's hit on the thigh pad and it rolls into the off side
138kph, fuller length on off, he defends on the front foot
136kph, shorter length, some width, he's back and punching square of the wicket to deep point
134kph, off cutter, good length, he pushes this slowly to mid on and runs with the stroke, it's tight but he beats the underarm throw
shorter length on middle, he pulls but straight to square leg in on the one
brilliant reverse sweep! This was on leg stump, he wristily slaps it into the gap at point and it races to the fence
95kph, on leg, he's back and turning this straight to square leg
darted in, 100kph, full on leg, he digs it out towards long on but Jadeja cuts it off
slower on off, he's turning this with the spin to square leg
full outside off, he drives forcefully but straight to cover-point
shorter length, 133kph, it climbs a bit, he rides the bounce, running it neatly to third man
136kph, back of a length wide off, he late cuts nicely placing this wide of third man, pushes hard for two and gets there easily
136kph, bouncer, too high and angled down leg and called wide
135kph, back of a length outside off, he's squared up a touch on the back foot, opens the face and runs it to third man
133kph, back of a length on off, he pulls this around through forward square to the sweeper on the rope
137kph, short ball, rib high, he swivels on the back foot and pulls this to wide fine leg
another bouncer, 134kph, too high again, wide again
135kph, good length, off stump, he gets a thick inside edge onto pad and it rolls to the gap at square leg
94kph, darted into leg stump, he clips this firmly through the gap to deep midwicket

LBW! He's given out sweeping! Khawaja has reviewed it. It was fired in flat and straight, it did turn a touch, he tried to sweep from a length, no hot spot, no spike on RTS, he has missed it, he was hit on the knee infront of middle and off, Hawkeye has it hitting the outside of leg. Umpire's call! Khawaja is out.
tossed up outside off, he leans out and pushes to long off
91kph, tossed up on off, he clips this with the turn through midwicket to the man in the deep
87kph, shorter length on off, he's back and punching it down to long on
90kph, shorter length, spinning into off, he pushes off the back foot to midwicket
131kph, good length outside off, he pushes on the front foot to cover
good length, fourth stump, he defends on the front foot to cover
132kph, good length, top of off, he pushes on the front foot to midwicket
138kph back of a length, he's back and defending to point
133kph, short ball, chest high pulled around to wide fine leg
121kph, shorter cutter into the hip, he's back and tucking this behind square
91kph, tossed up, he skips down the track and driving to long on with the turn
88kph, tossed up on off, he defends on the front foot to cover
tossed up on off, he skips out and drives to long off
91kph, into middle, he takes a couple of steps and clips this firmly to wide long on
89kph, into leg stump, he tucks it to square midwicket, they think about one but Dhawan cuts it off
tossed up high outside off, he drives magnificently past cover, he timed this beautifully to beat wide long off!
shorter length on odd, he tries to pull, mistimes it off the bottom edge chopping it into the leg side
steps back and across outside off early, Shami fires full and wide and he defends
139kph, driven nicely wide of mid off and goes with the stroke for one
130kph, outside leg, he tries to glance but it comes off pad and runs fine but Dhoni cuts it off
bouncer, way too high over Marsh's head and called wide
full on leg stump, he glances this one away behind square to a wide fine leg
133kph, head high bouncer, he swivels on a hook shot, hits it in the air for a way but pitches about halfway to the man at wide fine leg
131kph, back of a length, it holds up, he tries whip through square gets a leading edge and it balloons just wide of Bhuvi in his follow through!
133kph, good length outside off, he tries to run to third man but chops it to backward point
134kph, middle and off, he steps back and across and turns this behind square to deep backward square
133kph, good length on off, it stays a touch low, he goes back and defends jamming the bat down
130kph, shorter length, into the hip, it takes him on the thigh and rolls into the off side
good length, 129kph, on off, he tries to drive and mistimes to mid on
130kph, short and wide and he's back and across and cutting to deep point
135kph, fuller length but width offered, he thrashes the hands through it slicing this high over backward point and there is no one there as it rolls away to the rope!
135kph, drives but gets a thick edge that flies through the vacant slips to third man
he steps back and across early, shorter length into off, he tucks it around the corner behind square, he pushes for two, takes on the throw and beats it easily
134kph, fuller outside off, almost a yorker, he premeditated back and across and was forced to defend
slower ball, 114kph, good length, he defends off a thick inside edge that rolls square for one
length outside off, punched off the back foot through point, staying slightly leg side of the ball and opening the face to beat the point fielder
pulled away this time, short of length around off and dispatched past the mid-on fielder this time, back-to-back boundaries
length outside off, dabs it towards third man to get to the other end
length on the pads and tucked away behind square leg for one more
length around off, Handscomb goes back and across and works it towards square leg
length, around off and middle, pushed back towards the bowler
length outside off, drives it on the up towards deep extra cover
short of length and pulled away in front of square, gets to his fifty with a cracking boundary
short of length outside off, mistimes the pull towards mid-on, Kohli makes a tumbling stop
length around middle stays, leg-side of the ball and defends
length around off, driven on the up through covers for crunching boundary, timed to perfection
fuller around off, moves across and defends it on the off side
length ball, pitching outside leg and keeping a bit low to rap the batsman near the knee rolls, an appeal for lbw but not out, says the umpire. They sneak in a leg-bye though
length outside off, Handscomb looks to drive on the up once again, the ball hits the outer half and goes towards point, Jadeja makes a diving stop to his left
length outside off, plays it late this time, steering towards third man
length outside off, 132 kph, guided towards third man for one more
short of length outside off, moves across and wrists it towards fine leg, Marsh was looking for the second but Handscomb sends him back
length ball on the stumps, goes for the pull but misses, the ball beating the inside edge
length outside off, skips down and turns it towards square leg gently
fuller on the stumps this time, nudges it towards square leg for a quick single
flighted on the stumps, Marsh skips down and looks to clear long-on, doesn't middle it and Shami comes forward and takes a low tumbling catch
fuller on the stumps, use of feet to drive towards long-on
slower, length outside off, moves across and works it towards deep square leg
length outside off, looked like a googly, goes back and punches it towards mid-off
short of length outside off, steered towards point where Jadeja makes a partial stop, diving to his left
an attempted short one outside off, rises only waist-high and goes to Dhoni on the bounce
length outside off and left alone this time
a short one on middle and leg, looks to pull but lets it go in the end
an offcutter outside off, comes forward and pushes it towards mid-off
almost a yorker around off stump, punched towards mid-on for a quick single
tossed up, fuller outside off, driven towards long-off for one
use of feet once again, driven inside out towards wide long-off
flighted outside off, fuller in length, drives it to long-off again
googly, pitching around leg and middle, lunges forward and defends
short of length and leaving the batsman, goes for the cut but fails to put it away, straight to the point fielder
length around off and middle, punches it towards deep extra cover off the back foot
short and wide, goes back and cuts it towards deep backward point
fuller outside off, driven back towards the bowler
length again, tight line, just outside off, pushes it towards short midwicket
fuller around off, digs it out down the ground, finally a single
length ball, outside off, moves across and looks to flick it on the leg side, edges it on to his pads, gets the single as the ball drops on the of side
fuller, almost in the blockhole, punched towards long-on
fuller and wider outside off, drives it to extra cover
flatter and quicker outside off, pushes it towards point, Australia get to 200 with that single
fuller outside off, moves across and paddles it towards fine leg
length outside off, punches it towards covers but Rayudu cuts it off
flighted on middle and leg, pushed towards short midwicket
googly, length around off, punched towards long-off
length outside off, punches it towards cover
fuller outside off and uses his bottom hand to loft it over extra cover, Shami moves to his left to keep it to one
fuller on the pads, paddled towards fine leg, Khaleel there. A bit of fumble by him allows a comfortable second
length outside off, flicks it towards fine leg, only one this time
length , flatter and quicker, 92.8kph, angled on to the pads, pushed towards short midwicket
length outside off, goes down on one knee and sweeps it towards fine leg
skips down but Kuldeep pulls his length ball, pushes it back towards the bowler
flighted around off, goes for the sweep but misses, gets hit on the leg, and the ball rolls towards short third man, an overthrow allows an extra run
fuller outside off and slog-swept over wide long-on, first six of the innings. A boundary after 45 balls
fuller, dipping at the batsman, pushed towards short midwicket
googly, length around off, moves across and flicks it towards square leg
length ball, around off. Looked like a googly, Handscomb goes back and lofts it over long-on, just clearing the fielder, and that's his fifty as well
flatter outside off, a powerful straight hit past Jadeja, a fumble at long-off by Shami allows a comfortable second
flicked towards midwicket this time but Dhawan is quick to the ball and prevents the second
flatter on the stumps, pushed towards the right of the bowler for a quick single
length outside off punched off the back foot towards the left of long-off
use of feet, Jadeja shortens his length but Handscomb goes with the shot, places it wide of Shami at long-off
length, Handscomb was backing away this time, Jadeja follows him and denies any room, looks to punch through the off side, mistimes it back towards the bowler
short of length outside off, goes back and cuts it towards sweeper cover
length outside off, down the track and lofts it over extra cover, didn't try to hit it hard, nailed the placement to find a boundary
length outside off, moves across and flicks it towards fine leg
length around off, stays back and defends it towards the bowler
short of length outside off, drags it towards deep midwicket with a pull, 50 of the stand comes up in as many balls
a full toss on the leg stump, Handscomb moves across and dispatches it behind square leg, 11 from that over
right in the blockhole, Stoinis jams his bat at it to keep it out
another brilliant yorker, Stoinis goes deep and digs it out towards square leg
length outside off, down the track and looks to go over extra cover, doesn't middle it but will get two to sweeper cover, Karthik there
a full toss but down the leg side, lucky for Shami that Handscomb didn't any bat on it
comes down the track but Shami sees that and slips in a bouncer, Handscomb looks to pull but that's too high
in the blockhole, Handscomb was once again coming down, steers it towards point
a full toss on the stumps but Stoinis fails to put it away, hits it towards deep midwicket
lands safe, down the track but Shami bowls it short again, goes for the pull, gets a top-edge but it lands safely at square leg
short of length outside off, goes for the pull, Rayudu at fine leg makes a one-handed effort but ends up parrying it over the boundary
taken this time, Dhawan at sweeper cover makes no mistake. Length outside off, skips down and looks to loft it over extra cover, doesn't get enough power and an easy catch there
length outside off, moves across and works it towards fine leg
slower one outside off, guided towards point where the fielder ends up deflecting the ball towards short third man
length outside off, backs away and hits it towards cover
length outside off, wide outside off, reaches out and hits it towards extra cover
a high full toss on the off stump, a mis-field by Rayudu at long-off allows the second
short of length, goes for the pull, doesn't get the timing right but it's in the gap, Rayudu sprints to his right, puts in the dive but cannot stop it
fuller outside off, whipped towards square leg for two more
short of length, goes for the pull but ends up inside-edging it on to his thigh
fuller on the stumps, fails to get under the ball, along the ground towards long-on
short of length outside off, backs away and cuts it over covers, Kohli at sweeper cover does the tidying up
slower one outside off, but way too wide, needs to be bowled again
a juicy full toss on the stumps and put away over square leg boundary for a six
length outside off, slower one perhaps, Stoinis fails to reach there
length outside off, looks to hoick it on the leg side, gets an outside edge and it goes between the keeper and the short third man
wide outside off, looks to go aerial over extra cover, ends up slicing it towards deep backward point, lands just short of charging in Rohit
fuller around off, Maxwell moves just towards the off side and hits it in the air, a wristy flick to beat the man at deep midwicket
fuller and wider and Maxwell hits it towards deep extra cover, they sprints back for the second and make it easily before Bhuvneshwar receives the throw
136kph, good length, fourth stump line, he defends on the front foot knocking it down with soft hands towards gully
130kph, shorter length, nipping back a touch, it catches Rohit on the thigh and rolls away into the off side
good length, angled across, he's happy to let this go
134kph, back of a length on leg stump, he turns this away to forward square leg
fuller swinging into the front pad, they appeal, not out, it runs to gully. Australia review! This is madness. It's pitched outside leg, swinging down, it was high. Not even close.

LBW! Given out and Dhawan walks off! Behrendorff gets his first. Fuller length, it nipped back off the seam, Dhawan's head falls over, it beats the inside edge and hits him plumb on the shin in front of off! No doubt about that one.
good length, swinging away, he stands up and punches off the back foot to cover-point and Lyon makes a great save
137kph, good length, nice away swing, fifth stump line, he leaves it alone
134kph, back of a length on middle and leg, he defends from the crease to midwicket
137kph, good length fifth stump line, he leaves again outside off
137kph, short and wide, swinging away, he's trying to cut, flashing hard but misses
139kph, good length outswinger, wide of off, he leaves this alone
134kph, good length, angled across Kohli, he's happy to leave this
135kph, fuller length on off, no swing here, he pushes firmly on the front foot to mid on
fuller outside off, he drives nicely past cover-point, Lyon is close, he got a touch on it, enough to slow it a bit, but they still get two
132kph, back of a length, Kohli walks down a touch and defends on the front foot
136kph, fuller angled across the right hander, he angles the bat and steers it to third man
135kph, back of a length, outside off, he defends standing tall into the off side
134kph, good length outswinger, he defends on the front foot with an open face towards backward point
138kph, good length angled into middle, he turns this off the front foot to forward square with the angle

caught at square leg! Oh no! He's nailed this off his pads straight to Marcus Stoinis at forward square! It was 138kph, nearly a half-volley on leg stump, he pinged it off his pads but in the air, waist high, straight to Stoinis, he sucked his stomach in, it bobbled a touch but he clutched it tight!
back of a length on off, he defends from the crease knocking it down into the off side

LBW! Rayudu has a long chat with Rohit and he decides to review. This was full and fast, it angled in and didn't swing, beat the inside edge, nothing on hot spot, hit below the knee roll. It was smashing into leg stump! OUT! Three reds light up on Hawkeye! Hitting in line, and crashing into leg.
140kph, good length outside off, he's back and across and defending with the full face pushing to mid on
132kph, short and wide off, he slashes at a cut shot but is beaten by extra bounce
135kph, fuller length on leg stump, he defends on the front foot to mid on
133kph, fuller angled across, he pushes on the front foot to cover
133kph, good length, off stump line, he defends on the front foot to mid off
he oversteps, good length on off, he defends on the front foot

133kph, full on leg stump, he flicks this high and long to deep square, Marsh on the rope catches it and parries it back in but his heel was touching the padding of the rope! After a long delay it's signalled six!
139kph, back of a length outside off, it stays a touch low, he gets this off the bottom of the bat into the off side
beaten by a cracking 139kph outswinger, he shuffles back and across and it shapes past the edge
137kph, sprayed down the leg side, and called wide
138kph, short and swinging way wide of off stump, he leaves, it's too wide
136kph, back of a length, outside off, he shuffles across and defends into the off side
138kph, good length wide of off he leaves alone
138kph, fuller length on off, he defends on the front foot
shorter length, he tries to pull, comes off the bottom edge onto thigh pad, pops up on the leg side and falls safe, well short of the man coming in
fuller length, he pushes on the front foot, gets a thick inside edge that runs down to fine leg
133kph, good length outside off, he skips down and pushes this to mid off
good length, angled across, he shuffles outside off and shoulders arms, it just brushes the pad, half an appeal but it's outside the line
fuller length, he drives on the front foot but drags it to mid on
134kph, full outside off, he pushes on the front foot towards mid on
129kph, back of a length on leg stump, it hits him on the thigh pad as he tries to work it square
135kph, back of a length, he defends off the back foot to point
134kph, good length, angled into middle and off, he defends from the crease with the full face
138kph, good length into middle and off, he pushes this into a gap at midwicket for a single
137kph, back of a length outside off, he's up on his toes punching to mid off
139kph, good length outside off, he tries to run it third man but chops it off the bottom edge on the bounce to the keeper
shorter length, he swivels on a pull shot but gets a bottom edge dragging it behind square
140kph, good length outside off, he's trying to force off the back foot through cover, he gets a thick edge through the vacant gully to third man
135kph, good length angled outside off, he opens the face on the front foot running it to third man
133kph, fuller length, he pushes on the front foot back to the bowler
134kph, back of a length on off, he's back and across and tucking it behind square
129kph, good length on off, he defends on the front foot back to the bowler
131kph, good length, top of off, he defends from the crease on the front foot
131kph, back of a length outside off, he pushes this just behind backward point, there might have been one there, but MS Dhoni says no as Maxwell zips to his left
135kph, good length, nipping back, thick inside edge onto pad and rolls to third man
135kph, fuller on off, he clips this to mid on
good length on off, he presses forward and defends off the thick inside edge onto pad
135kph, good length, fifth stump line, he defends with an open face running this to third man
135kph, wide of off, he skips down to drive but misses as it just nips away
back of a length, 136kph, on off, he defends from the crease
89kph, off break, good length, he's back and punching to long on
88kph, looped up, he reaches out and drives back to the bowler
89kph tossed up outside off, he sweeps from outside off to short fine
88kph, flatter on off, he's back and pushing to cover-point for one
88kph, good length spinning into off, he's back and punching to long on
89kph, shorter length outside off, he's pushes off the back foot through cover-point to the sweeper
138kph, good length outside off, he's back and forcing this straight to cover-point
137kph, good length, top of off, he covers up in defence
139kph, fuller length on off, he pushes on the front foot to mid off
138kph, fuller angled into middle and off, he drives nicely to the gap wide of mid on
139kph angled into leg, struck on the pad, huge appeal for LBW but given Not Out. It was sliding down leg
139kph, good length targeting off stump, he defends on the front foot
tossed up, 88kph, on off, he pushes forward into the off side
88kph, tossed up, he skips down and drives straight back to Lyon
88kph, good length outside off, he dances down and pushes back to the bowler
tossed up again, and again he skips out and pushes back to the bowler
shorter length, 89kph, he's back and pushing this to cover
96kph, darted in, he skips down and pushes towards long on, but Lyon dives across to save the single!
135kph, good length outside off, it nibbles away off the seam, he swings hard trying to hit over the off side but misses
141kph, yorker outside off, he jams the bat down squeezing it out to point
139kph, good length, he skips down trying to loft down the ground, he slices it taking one hand off the bat and it balloons high over backward point for a couple
135kph, bouncer, he swivels and pulls this way back over deep backward square and into the crowd! Great strike from Rohit. He's upping the ante here
136kph, angled into leg stump, he tucks this away off the front foot to square deep midwicket
139kph, he pushes on the front foot to cover-point
89kph, good length, he's stays back, it shoots a touch low, he works this to forward square
tossed up outside off, he skips down and lofts this inside out over cover, doesn't time it that well, slices it a touch but they get two
89kph, shorter into leg stump, he clips this through square leg to the sweeper
93kph, he skips down to a length ball, pushes towards mid on but Lyon dives across to make the save
here we go, he skips down and launches this way back over long on! MS Dhoni of old, he just got down to the pitch and thumped it way over the fence, 25 rows back!
flatter on off, he dances out and pushes this with the angle to midwicket
137kph, good length wide off, he late cuts dabbing this down to third man
138kph, fuller on off, he pushes on the front foot back to the bowler
back of a length on off, he pushes off the back foot to point
123kph, leg cutter slower ball, he late cuts, knocking it down to third man with fast wrists
137kph, good length wide of off, he opens the face and angles this down to third man for a single
139kph, good length outside off, he raises the bat and leaves this alone
length around off, comes forward and defends
short outside off, goes back and punches it towards point
length ball, on the leg stump, goes for the fine sweep but misses
length outside off, comes forward and blocks
length outside off once more, stays in the crease and drops it on the off side
down the track and lofts it over deep midwicket, clears the fielder easily
length on middle and leg, looks to flick but misses, gets hit on the thigh
length around off, moves across and flicks it towards square leg
short of length on middle and leg, tucked away towards deep square leg
short of length down the leg side, pulls it towards fine leg
length outside off, punches it through extra cover, there's protection in deep
fuller outside off, mistimes the drive to mid-off
length outside off, waits for it before guiding it past short third man, comes back for the third
length outside off, uses his feet but doesn't reach the pitch, thrusts his bat and pad at it
dances down again, not to the ball and ends up dragging it towards deep midwicket
length outside off, defended on the off side
fuller on the off stump, drives it towards long-off
quicker one, 102kph, fuller outside off, Dhoni was caught on the back foot, gets his bat down in time to push it towards covers
length outside off, punched on the up, was in the air for a bit but away from extra cover, a quick single before mid-off cuts it off
length outside off, works it towards fine leg for a brace
fuller outside off, driven towards deep extra cover for one
back of length on middle and leg, tucks it towards fine leg
fuller outside off, punched with a lot of bottom hand but straight to the extra cover fielder
fuller outside off, driven but once again extra cover fielder intercepts, a partial stop allows a run
length outside off, some room there as well and here we have the first four of the innings, crunched through point
length outside off, left alone this time
length around off, comes forward and pushes it towards extra cover
length around off, pushed towards extra cover once again, another dot
length outside off, punches it towards sweeper cover for a single
length around off, comes forward and defends it towards covers
down the track to this short of length ball, pulls it towards short midwicket, just over the head of the fielder who gets an outstretched right hand but fails to latch on, brushing the fingertips
short again, pulled into the ground this time, mistimes it towards short midwicket
length outside off, in the corridor, left alone
fuller on the stumps, pushes it towards midwicket for a quick single
fuller around off, looks to push straight, doesn't middle it and it rolls towards square leg
an attempted bouncer, down the leg side and balloons over
length outside off, comes forward and pushes it towards covers
bowled from wide of the crease, fuller around off, tucked away towards square leg
length outside off and driven on the up, through covers, beats the man at sweeper cover as well
fuller around off this time, works it gently towards long-on
back of length outside off, punches it towards covers
length on middle and leg, flicks it behind square for one
length around off, stays in his crease, gets behind the line and blocks
length outside off, dabs it towards cover-point
a touch fuller around off, pushes it towards short midwicket
length around middle, swept and swept hard, just beats the man at square leg and gets a boundary. Jhye Richardson there flungs himself to his left but it evades him
use of feet but doesn't middle it, gets a single to fine leg
gets to his fifty, fuller outside off, wanted to go over covers but ends up slicing it over short third man, Siddle puts in the chase but cannot pull it back in time
length around off, pushes it towards covers
short of length, angled towards the batsman, pushes it towards short midwicket
back of length, some extra bounce there, hitting near the splice of the bat, a single to square leg
short of length outside off, dabs it towards third man for one
fuller in the stumps, goes back and flicks it behind square leg
length outside off, waits for it before dabbing it to third man
short of length outside off, goes for the pull but the ball goes under the bat
length around middle and off, pushes it towards the non-striker, Lyon moves across to stop
an inside edge but away from the stumps, was a length ball and a bit spin there, Rohit gets a single to short fine leg
back of length outside off, punches it towards extra cover and sprints away, puts in the full-length dive to make his ground
length around off, comes forward and blocks
flatter around off and middle, 90kph, pushed back
length on the stumps again, stands tall and defends
short of length outside off, comes down and steers it towards deep point, comes back for the second
short of length outside off, punched towards sweeper cover this time, only a single
length outside off, Rohit was at the back foot, punched towards extra cover for another quick single
a bouncer this time, but down the leg side and called a wide
length on middle and leg, flicked towards fine leg
length outside off, steers it towards third man to rotate the strike
length on middle and leg, flicked towards square leg
length outside off, comes down the track and flicks it to square leg
length again, Dhoni uses his feet and misses, hits on the pads, but way too down the wicket, a leg-bye to extra cover
length outside off, opens the face of the bat to run it towards third man
length outside off, punched on the off side, Lyon fields himself
length on middle, Rohit turns it towards the left of the keeper but Dhoni is not interested in the run
length but down the leg side, some exercise for the umpire
length on middle and leg, tucked away towards square leg
length around off and Rohit goes down to scoop it over short fine leg, gets a boundary
short of length outside off, steered towards third man
length around off and middle, pushed towards square leg and Dhoni sprints across to complete the single
length around middle, Rohit stays leg-side of the ball and dabs it towards cover-point
fuller outside off and Rohit just nonchalantly lofts it over mid-off, bounces just inside
fuller around off, uses his feet to work it towards square leg, comes back for the second
comes down again and pushes it towards square leg, only a single this time
length on middle and leg, turns it towards square leg
length outside off, looks to punch it on the back foot, gets an outside edge, well short of short third man
down the track and launches it over wide long-on, into the crowd for a biggie
length on middle and leg, flicks it towards short fine leg
length outside off, pushes it towards covers
fuller around off, played around his front pad, flicked towards square leg
back of length outside off, punched towards extra cover
length outside off, charges down and looks to push at it, gets beaten
length outside off, chops it into the ground in an attempt to cut
short of length around off, Dhoni goes back and turns it towards square leg, sneaks in a quick single
fuller on the stumps and Dhoni drills it past mid-on, who dives, gets a hand but cannot stop the boundary, gets to his fifty
short of length outside off, defends it towards point
short of length outside off, cuts it towards covers
length outside off, pushes at it, a thick outside off, one bounce to short third man
length outside off, comes forward and dabs it towards cover for one
length outside off, steers it towards deep backward point, the call is for two but they will have to be satisfied with only one
length around middle and off, punches it towards extra cover for a quick single
fuller on the stumps, Dhoni was on the back foot, looks to flick it on the leg side and misses, trapped right in front, and up goes the finger
133kph, good length, angled across, he defends from the crease angling the bat and running it to third man
good length, on off, he defends on the front foot to cover
128kph, full on middle and leg, he clips this down to long on
back of a length outside off, he pushes wide of mid off and taking a single
124kph, good length, he square drives on the up through point to the sweeper
129kph, fuller into off stump, he pushes on the front foot to mid on
132kph, good length wide of off, he tries to thrash a cut shot, but it wasn't short enough, he misses
127kph, back of a length outside off, he's back and working this behind square to the sweeper
good length outside off, he chops it off the bottom edge towards gully but there's no single available
130kph, good length fifth stump line, he late cuts very fine, Siddle runs around at third man but it's an easy two
133kph, good length, on off, he pushes on the front foot to cover
128kph, good length on off, he leans into a drive placing it to straight mid off but not firm enough to beat the man
good length on middle, he tries to turn against the angle to leg, gets a leading edge along the ground back to the bowler
131kph, good length angle across him, he opens the face and defends this on the front foot to backward point
129kph, good length on leg, he skips down and glances this down to fine leg, he wants two but Rohit wisely screams NO
132kph, good length on middle, he's tucking this behind square for an easy one
126kph, back of a length, he stands tall and punches off the back foot through cover to the sweeper
good length on off, he skips down and works this with the angle to midwicket
129kph, good length, top of off, he defends from the crease and drops the bat by accident
good length on off, he pushes on the front foot to mid off
fuller angled into middle, he clips this away off the stumps through midwicket to the sweeper
good length angled into leg, he backs away to free his arms, but he checks the shot, defending to midwicket
130kph, good length outside off, he skips down and tries to drive, it comes off the toe end of the bat and bounces well wide of off stump
126kph, good length on leg, he swings this away to deep square leg but straight to the man on the rope
132kph, he skips down the track, tries to flat bat this length ball down the ground, chops a bottom edge well away from leg stump and runs fine of fine leg for a couple
fuller length, he plays a lovely straight drive, just leans on it, Behrendorff gets a touch but can't stop it, it's straight of long on and an easy two
back of a length, outside off, he pushes through cover-point
131kph, shorter length down leg, he pulls but gets it off the glove, it bounces fine but Carey can't stop it, he gets a glove to knock the pace off it but it runs fine of fine leg for a couple
nearly bowled him! This was so close to off. A good length angled in, Rohit tried to hit this out of the ground over midwicket, missed and it just went past off stump!
137kph, good length, a touch of tail into off, he mis-times this to midwicket
135kph, back of a length, he plays with soft hands knocking into the gully
136kph, good length into leg stump, he tries to turn through forward square, gets a leading edge that goes back to the bowler on the bounce
wide of the crease, 139kph, good length angled into off, he defends on the front foot
good length, outside off, he runs this off the face to third man
135kph, good length on off, he swings this away through the leg side across the line, it runs out to deep midwicket
135kph, short ball, he pulls in the air, not out of the middle but it's struck well enough into the gap at deep straight midwicket and it rolls to the rope!
backs away, tries to loft a drive, mis-times it well short of mid off
110kph slower ball but it's too short, Rohit swivels and smacks a pull shot over midwicket into the gap again!
119kph, good length outside off, he steps outside off and paddle scoops it up over short fine leg! Class batting. Midwicket went back, fine leg came up and he makes them pay!
yorker, outside off, he has to jam the bat down and defend
138kph, full on off, he drives firmly back at the bowler, Richardson gets a finger on it as it runs to mid off
chopped on! Bowled! He charged, it was premeditated, Richardson dug it in shorter outside off, he tried to pull on the move, got a bottom edge and dragged it onto the stumps!
good length angled across, he leaves this alone through to the keeper
139kph, short ball, he pulls but mis-times it through midwicket to the sweeper
140kph, full into the pads, he clips this away easily behind square into the gap for two! Wonderful 100 for Rohit Sharma! He has played beautifully. Subdued celebration. More work to do
full on middle, he drives easily to long on
shorter length, he's back working this through midwicket to the man in the deep
92kph, darted in shorter, he's back and punching this hard past cover, but the sweeper comes around to cut off a second
88kph, angled across him, he pushes to cover-point on the front foot
he sweeps and is hit on the pad, huge appeal, but this pitched outside leg. The umpire gets this right. Not out
tossed up, he skips down the track and drives hard to long off
pushed through on off, 95kph, he nudges this to gap at point
95kph, tossed up outside off, he works it against the turn to the vacant circle at midwicket and they run very well for two
drifting into off, he pushes this to midwicket but Maxwell sprints across to ensure no two this time
yorker length, perfect delivery, on the crease, on middle, he just digs it out
skied straight up but it falls short of Stoinis running in from deep midwicket! Maxwell slowed the pace up, he swung hard, skied a top edge but it landed safe. They run two
fired quicker and flatter, angled across and beats the bat as he tries to dab it to third man
97kph, high full toss, just below waist high, he swings hard, gets an outside edge and it runs fine to third man for four!
drifting into leg, he gets an inside edge onto pad
shorter length, hint of spin, he gives room and cuts hard to deep point
he stands still, it's in the arc, and he launches it over long on and into the crowd! Great strike!
100kph quicker, he tries to slog sweep but drags it along the ground behind square
slightly shorter, 94kph, he's back and cutting a ball, not that short, straight to point
slid through on off, 98kph, he's back and miscuing a back foot punch back to the bowler
128kph, he gives room and tries to launch down the ground, but miscues, takes one hand off the bat, it lands well short of long on
128kph, bouncer, followed him as he backed away, he tried to pull but missed it
back of a length on leg, he skips down and knocks it down, they take a tight one, Stoinis follows through and underarms and just misses! Rohit might have been out if he hit
short and wide, he tries to cut but misses this one
nailed it into the second tier of the Member's stand at deep midwicket! Full in the slot on middle and that swing of the bat was pure! Out of the screws it sailed way back!
length ball, outside off, he swipes this hard and flat into the gap at midwicket at it beats the sweeper running around! The power of Rohit is stunning! He does it so easily

caught at deep backward point! He bowled a quick short ball, Jadeja backs away and upper cuts, he flushes it but gets it too square, it goes all the way to Marsh on the rope, he settles and takes the catch! Four for Richardson
112kph, slower ball, short outside off, he cuts to deep point along the ground
139kph, full and speared into middle and off, he does well to dig this out back to the bowler
138kph, he backs away and nails a drive to cover, Rohit backed up too far, Finch fielded brilliantly, flicked it at the bowler's end and missed, Rohit dives back and takes out the stumps!
105kph, leg cutter slower ball, completely fools him outside off, he swings way too early and misses. It was out of the back of the hand
135kph, bouncer, he backs away, to upper cut but it follows him and he misses
126kph, full toss, just below waist high, wide of off, he miscues a baseball style swing, out to wide long on
99kph, slower ball, he steps way outside off to heave over the leg side, he miscues spooning this out towards long on
126kph slower ball, gets it wrong, sprays way wide of off and called a wide
125kph, full toss outside off, he swings hard, miscues off the toe but he gets enough of it to just float over the head of mid off and away to the rope!

caught at deep midwicket! Rohit's brave lone hand comes to an end. Slower ball banged in back of a length, he tries to heave this again over midwicket for six, miscues, gets a thick top edge, Maxwell is down at deep midwicket, he runs in and pouches the catch!
dropped by Khawaja at long on! Slower ball, into the wicket, he swings this high towards long on, Khawaja runs in and slides and puts it down! He was late to get to it. Might have misjudged it
slower ball outside off, he steps way across outside off trying to swing it to fine leg but misses
full angled into leg stump, he clips this away very neatly off his pads behind square to the sweeper
109kph, slower ball, back of a length, he backs away and miscues slapping this off the toe end of the bat towards long on
106kph, slower ball, back of a length, it comes off the thigh pad and rolls to the keeper
102kph, slower ball, back of a length, he pulls this away through midwicket to the sweeper
136kph, yorker speared into the feet as he backs away, it comes off the boot
yorker, 133kph, fired into leg stump, he squeezes this out behind square
128kph, short ball, he skips down and backs away, and upper cuts this over short third man and away to the rope!
127kph, back of a length, he backs away and carves this away behind point and Marsh can't cut it off!
slower ball, outside off, he steps way outside off, to paddle scoop it fine but misses

almost a screamer at short fine from Behrendorff! Slower ball bouncer, he pulled it in the air, to the left of short fine, Behrendorff, flies full stretch to his left and just gets a hand to it but can't hold on
slower ball, he steps outside off, it comes off thigh pad
dropped by Khawaja at long on! This was in the slot, he got under it hitting it miles in the air to long on, but not long enough, Khawaja, waits under it, waits and waits, and drops it
shorter outside off, he cuts hard up and over point for four!
115kph, slower ball on middle, he skips out and drives wide of cover
115kph, short slower ball, he mis-times a pull through forward square
slower ball, back of a length, he backs away and lofts this up and over cover for two more
133kph, full toss speared into leg, he clips this away through midwicket

caught at deep backward square! Khawaja holds one! Slower ball, shorter, he steps outside off and pulls this in the air to deep backward square, Khawaja waits again, but he clings onto this one and Siddle has a wicket!
107kph, slower ball outside off, he slices this high in the air, to point and it lands safe between three men! Stoinis can't believe it
slower ball, on the hip, he just tucks this around the corner for a single
slower ball, he picks it and plays a magnificent cover drive, inside out, lacing it to the rope!
100kph slower ball again, he skips down and hammers a drive to Zampa on the circle

nearly caught at deep backward square! He swings high to deep backward square, Handscomb runs around, dives and gets two hands to it, and it pops out as he hits the ground! It would have been a beauty
caught at deep midwicket! Stoinis gets one to finish! He launched this miles in the air, Maxwell, one of the best in the business runs in from deep midwicket, camps under it and takes it very calmly!
